DOC.brief_summary: A study to research the post-operative results according to the chosen surgical technique and evaluate the refractive changes before and after the excision of pterygium.
DOC.brief_title: Different Surgical Techniques for Pterygium Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: To analyze the epidemiological profile of patients who were operated of pterygium in Eyes Institute of Goi√¢nia, analyze the post-operative results according to the chosen surgical technique and evaluate the refractive changes before and after the excision of pterygium.
DOC.criteria: Patients who were underwent the pterygium surgery during the period between from February 2013 to August 2013 Patients with mature cataract
